text: Hagi ana maka Judama me'nea ranra kumapintira, pristi vahera Josai'a kehige'za Jerusalemi azageno, ana kumapima havi anumzante'ma kresramnama nevaza kumatmina eri haviza nehuno, noti kaziga Geba ran kumateti agafa huteno vuno Sauti kaziga Beseba ran kumate uramigeno, ana kumatmimpima havi anumzante'ma Kresramanama nevaza kumatmina vahe zamavufi eri pagehena hu'ne. Ana nehuno Jerusalemi rankumamofo gavana ne' Josua kafa tva'onte'ma hoga kaziga me'nege'za havi anumzante'ma Kresramanama nevaza itaraminena eri haviza hutre'ne.
